FuncDef:
The display dcn element-info command displays details about all NEs that use sub-interfaces 4094 for DCN communication.
This command varies in transport and router modes. For detailed differences, see Differences Between Commands in Transport and Router Modes. This topic describes the command configuration in router mode.
Examples: NEID            NEIP            MAC ADDRESS    DEVICETYPE  COMPANY   NEIPv6
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view details about all NEs that use sub-interfaces 4094 for DCN communication, run the display dcn element-info command. This command can be used to query NE information only when DCN communication through sub-interface 4094 is enabled.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
